data.title: What local ABC, CBS, FOX, NBC, and CW stations does Fubo carry?
data.meta_description: Use the search box below to find which local ABC, CBS, FOX, NBC, CW, Telemundo, and Univision channels are carried in your area.  Local...
data.text:
Use the search box below to find which local ABC, CBS, FOX, NBC, CW, Telemundo, and Univision channels are carried in your area.

Local programming is included with all US-English base plans (Pro, Elite, Premier).

If you are in a market in which your local station is not yet carried on Fubo, network programming is available via Video On Demand or the networkâ€™s TV Everywhere app(s).

Local Channels Search

If you are looking for a specific local channel, enter a call sign (ex: WNBC) in the box below. To see all local programming available in an area, enter a city (ex: New York).

ABC East/Central/Mountain/West is a national version of the ABC Network. It allows you to watch nationally broadcast ABC programming, as well as national news, sports and other events.

All four channels show the same programming, with schedules adjusted by time zone.

CBS East/West is a national version of the CBS Network. It allows you to watch national CBS programming, as well as nationally-broadcast news, sports, and other events.

TELE-E/W are national versions of Telemundo. They will allow you to watch national Telemundo programming including news, sports, and other events.
